EmailTemplate.description: This email informs user their SF Request is in progress
EmailTemplate.name: SF Request In Progress
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Salesforce Request Is In Progress
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Salesforce_Request__c.OwnerFirstName},
Your Salesforce request is now in progress. As the ticket progresses, you will continue to receive emails to alert you of status updates and comments made on the ticket.
In the meantime, if you would like to edit your request or reach out to the Salesforce team via Chatter, you can do so by visiting your ticket: {!Salesforce_Request__c.Link}.
Stay tuned!
